PERSONA:
meet robert johnson, a 67-year-old married white man living in a small town in rural montana. a high school graduate, robert spent most of his working life as a skilled tradesman, having learned the carpentry trade from his father. after serving in the military right out of high school, he returned home and started his own successful construction business, building custom homes for affluent clients in the region.

despite never pursuing higher education, robert's hard work, entrepreneurial spirit, and commitment to quality allowed his business to thrive for over 35 years. now retired, he and his wife own their home outright, having paid off the mortgage years ago. with an annual income between $90,000 to $100,000 from his retirement savings and investment portfolio, they enjoy a comfortable upper-income lifestyle in their tight-knit community.

a devout protestant and born-again christian, robert attends religious services more than once a week and his faith is deeply intertwined with his conservative values and political beliefs. he is a registered republican voter and considers himself ideologically conservative, especially on economic issues and traditional family values. 

while not particularly tech-savvy, robert does use the internet several times a week to stay informed, primarily relying on conservative news sources and websites that align with his worldview. he is deeply patriotic, having served in the military, and believes strongly in limited government, fiscal responsibility, and protecting individual liberties.

robert's primary economic concerns revolve around preserving his financial security in retirement, keeping taxes low, and ensuring economic opportunities for future generations, including his own grandchildren. he worries about the national debt, overregulation, and what he perceives as a culture shift away from traditional american values.

despite his conservative leanings, robert is not blindly partisan and is open to considering alternative perspectives, especially from those he respects within his community. he values hard work, personal responsibility, and self-reliance – traits he believes helped him build a successful life and business. while set in some of his ways, he remains engaged in local issues and regularly volunteers his time to support causes he cares about.
